title: Drawing, "DragonOil", after 1980
medium: Self-adhesive photographic film; pen and black ink; brush and white gouache; white pressure sensitive tape; white tracing paper mounted on Bainbridge 172 hot press finish illustration board
markings: Verso of illustration board. Bainbridge logo
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: Black letters on individually cut, pressure sensitive photographic film outlined in black, ruled blue lines at center of board. Tracing paper overlay mounted on white Bainbridge board. Paste up for advertising campaign.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "DragonOil", after 1980.
after 1980. Self-adhesive photographic film; pen and black ink; brush and white gouache; white pressure sensitive tape; white tracing paper mounted on Bainbridge 172 hot press finish illustration board. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-386.
